content: For the first quarter of 2022, Stabilis reported revenues of $23 million, down slightly from the record Q4 2021 revenues of $23.7 million, but 30% higher than the year ago quarter. Revenues from our LNG segment were $20.3 million, down 3% from the fourth quarter of 2021, but 26% higher than the year ago quarter. Revenues from our Power Delivery segment were $2.8 million, down 3% from the fourth quarter of 2021, but 79% higher than the year ago quarter.
